name: RetrieveQuotesBatch
description:
Retrieve multiple quotes by ID or custom property.

This tool retrieves multiple quote records by their IDs or a custom unique value property. It should be called when you need to access specific quotes in batch format from the HubSpot CRM.

parameters.name: quote_retrieval_criteria
parameters.description: JSON object specifying properties to retrieve quotes by ID or custom property. Use 'idProperty' for custom property and 'inputs' for IDs.

propertiesWithHistory.description: Key-value pairs for setting properties for the new object and their histories.

idProperty.description: When using a custom unique value property to retrieve records, the name of the property. Do not include this parameter if retrieving by record ID.

properties.description: Key-value pairs for setting properties for the new object.

parameters.name: archived_results_only
parameters.description: Specify `true` to return only archived results; `false` to include non-archived results.

value_schema.description: Whether to return only results that have been archived.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the hubspot_crm API.

parameters.name: archived
parameters.description: Whether to return only results that have been archived.

value_schema.description: Whether to return only results that have been archived.

propertiesWithHistory.description: Key-value pairs for setting properties for the new object and their histories.

idProperty.description: When using a custom unique value property to retrieve records, the name of the property. Do not include this parameter if retrieving by record ID.

properties.description: Key-value pairs for setting properties for the new object.

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
